#!/bin/bash
# Set the variables timeServer="time.apple.com" domainName="domain.com" computerOU="CN=Computers,DC=domain,DC=com" adminUser="username" adminPass="password" domainAdmin="username@domain.com" domainPass="password"
# Check and see if the computerName file exists, if so set some settings if (test -e "/Users/Shared/computerName.txt"); then newComputerName="$(cat /Users/Shared/computerName.txt)"
# Change the computer name if [[ "${newComputerName}" != "" ]]; then scutil --set HostName $newComputerName scutil --set LocalHostName $newComputerName scutil --set ComputerName $newComputerName rm /Users/Shared/computerName.txt echo "Computer renamed"
# Join comptuer to the domain echo y | dsconfigad -a ${newComputerName:0:15} -u $domainAdmin -p $domainPass -ou $computerOU -domain $domainName -mobile enable -mobileconfirm disable -localhome enable -useuncpath enable -group "Domain Admins,Enterprise Admins" -alldomain enable
fi
# Enable remote desktop /System/Library/CoreServices/RemoteManagement/ARDAgent.app/Contents/Resources/kickstart -activate -configure -allowAccessFor -allUsers -privs -ControlObserve -GenerateReports -OpenQuitApps -ChangeSettings -DeleteFiles -TextMessages -RestartShutDown -SendFiles -clientopts -setmenuextra -menuextra no
# Disable some startup items for USER_TEMPLATE in \"/System/Library/User Template\"/*; do defaults write \"${USER_TEMPLATE}\"/Library/Preferences/com.apple.SetupAssistant DidSeeCloudSetup -bool TRUE defaults write \"${USER_TEMPLATE}\"/Library/Preferences/com.apple.SetupAssistant GestureMovieSeen none defaults write \"${USER_TEMPLATE}\"/Library/Preferences/com.apple.SetupAssistant LastSeenCloudProductVersion \"${sw_vers}\" done
# Make the diagnostics data folder if [ ! -d "/Library/Application Support/CrashReporter" ]; then mkdir "/Library/Application Support/CrashReporter" chmod 775 "/Library/Application Support/CrashReporter" chown root:$adminUser "/Library/Application Support/CrashReporter" fi
# Send Diagnostic data to both apple and developers defaults write /Library/Application\ Support/CrashReporter/DiagnosticMessagesHistory AutoSubmit -boolean TRUE defaults write /Library/Application\ Support/CrashReporter/DiagnosticMessagesHistory AutoSubmitVersion -int 5 defaults write /Library/Application\ Support/CrashReporter/DiagnosticMessagesHistory ThirdPartyDataSubmit -boolean TRUE defaults write /Library/Application\ Support/CrashReporter/DiagnosticMessagesHistory ThirdPartyDataSubmitVersion -int 5 chmod a+r "/Library/Application Support/CrashReporter/DiagnosticMessagesHistory.plist" chown root:$adminUser "/Library/Application Support/CrashReporter/DiagnosticMessagesHistory.plist"
# Set the time zone systemsetup -settimezone America/New_York
# Disable using the location to set the timezone defaults write /Library/Preferences/com.apple.timezone.auto Active -bool false
# Set sleep settings isLaptop=`/usr/sbin/system_profiler SPHardwareDataType | grep "Model Identifier" | grep "Book"`
if [ "$isLaptop" != "" ]; then pmset -b sleep 60 disksleep 30 displaysleep 30 halfdim 1 pmset -c sleep 0 disksleep 0 displaysleep 30 halfdim 1 else pmset sleep 0 disksleep 0 displaysleep 30 halfdim 1 fi
fi
# Create the admin account if needed if !(test -e "/Users/$adminUser"); then sysadminctl -addUser admin dscl . -passwd /Users/$adminUser $adminPass dscl . -append /Groups/$adminUser GroupMembership admin dscl . -create /Users/$adminUser RealName "Admin" dscl . -create /Users/$adminUser Picture "/Library/User Pictures/Nature/Lightning.tif" fi
exit 1
